product_name: Vasque Clarion Gore-Tex Hiking Boots - Men's
long_description: Great for hiking and backpacking in wet conditions, these midweight boots feature waterproof, breathable Gore-Tex(R) Stormsock(R) booties. Uppers feature nubuck leather for durability and support, plus Cordura(R) nylon panels for reduced weight and improved ventilation. Side rubber rands enhance durability. Anatomically formed tongues and padded ankle collars cushion pressure points and help keep water and debris out of boots. Polyurethane Percussion Midsole System cushions feet and supports arches. Moisture-wicking Sportee(R) polyester knit linings help keep feet dry and comfortable. Deep V-lug rubber outsoles offer excellent traction.
short_description: Great for hiking and backpacking in wet conditions, these midweight boots feature waterproof, breathable Gore-Tex(R) Stormsock(R) booties.
